medical_history.chief_complaint: Upper arm fracture after a fall
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reported always being short for his age, consulting a pediatrician at 9 years for short stature. At 18 years, he was denied entry to the army due to a height of 147 cm. He began growing steadily around 25 years of age, ultimately reaching a height of 193 cm.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient was examined for short stature as a child and had normal intelligence and body proportions. He has not sought medical attention for his short stature since childhood.
medical_history.family_history: Patient is the child of healthy and unrelated parents. Father's height is 172 cm, and mother's height is 158 cm.
medical_history.social_history: The patient worked in an administrative office, completed high school, stopped smoking 10 years ago, and consumes a maximum of one glass of alcohol per week.
